Title: 🔁🎬 At the farewell ceremony for Jus, I said goodbye to Andriy P...
Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mykola Oleshchuk At the farewell ceremony for Jus, I said goodbye to the mother of Andriy Pilshchikov - Lilia Oleksandrivna, but let me sit in the cockpit of the F-16, near the aircraft on which I died Tati and Andriy. And I finished my words. ... It’s a pity that Juice hasn’t even finished his preparation for his start in the State of Purchasing. And today in the cockpit of the F-16th mother. Vaughn continues on the right side of her son and collects everything so that our wings will die. More details in the plot. During the hour of combat for the L-39, three Ukrainian pilots died: Vyacheslav Minka, Sergiy Prokazin and Andriy Pilshchikov (positive -Juice-). —————————————📹 The FullHD video is available on the official YouTube of the Insurgent Forces https://youtu.be/jARSVlMF0ZQ (there is also a version with English subtitles on the channel). Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️ ALL IMPACT UAVS ARE KILLED ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ On September 25, 20...
Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mykola Oleshchuk⚡️ 100% of the attack UAVs were killed➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖On September 25, 2024, the enemy commanded a strike with missiles of various types in the front-line areas edges. Chernihiv region, Sumy region, Kharkiv region, Donech region were attacked. The enemy stagnated ground-based missiles from the Voronezh and Rostov regions: the missile -Iskander-K, the ballistic -Iskander-M, and six ceramic Kh-59/X-69 aircraft missiles from the vast expanse of the Kursk and Belgorod regions. As a result of the active counteraction of the Ukrainian Defense Forces, most of the missiles did not reach their targets. The occupiers were also attacked by 9 strike drones of the Shahed type from the Chauda - Krim. All the martyrs were killed by mobile militant groups near the Mykolayiv region. 🇺🇦 Together - until victory!➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🦅 Commander of the Air Force, Lieutenant General Mikola Oleshchuk

Title: 🖼 On the night of September 24, 2024, Russian long-range Tu-22M3...
Description: On the morning of September 24, 2024, Russian long-range bombers Tu-22M3 attacked the day of Ukraine, firing several winged X-22 missiles into the area of ​​​​Snake Island. They also launched an attack by cored air bombs on the Kherson region. Last year, September 23, 2024, the anti-aircraft defense of Ukraine reduced five reconnaissance UAVs, including two -ZALA- and one each -Supercam-, -Orlan-10- and -Merlin-, as well as 2 strike UAVs -Lancet- .➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Povitrian command -Pivden-

Title: 🔁🖼 🔱 Independence is freedom, it is the right to choice, it is...
Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mykola Oleshchuk🔱 Independence is freedom, the right to choice, cultural values, the right to live in a powerful home on one’s own land. Legal independence is not easy. The history of the world has many uses, as involuntarily people fight for the ultimate goal - to live freely! The Ukrainian people will forever allow the empires to invade our holy land. Hundreds of rocks, I will hold in my hands, with a warm heart! Our struggle for independence is supported by the entire civilized world, but only we are left behind, as Ukraine is deprived of children and grandchildren. Therefore, today’s French air bomb may soon fly on the heads of the occupiers c. To fly for our future, for our land, for our freedom - for INDEPENDENCE!🇺🇦 Together - until victory!

Title: 🎬 #23_serpnya #Day_of_Sovereign_Prapor_Ukraine 🇺🇦 Sovereign_Pr...
Description: #23_serpnya#Day_of_Sovereign_Prapor_Ukraine🇺🇦 Sovereign_Prapor_of Ukraine! Symbol of our courage and rich struggle! Once again, the order is on the pixels covered by the brood and on the dress uniform. Above combat positions and in light arenas. On armored cars that go to the offensive, and on the wings of combat aircraft that carry gifts to the occupiers. They proudly fly in Vinnytsia, Sumy and Kherson, Kharkiv and Lviv... That, as a symbol of the inevitable victory of Ukraine - over the settlements of Kursk region ! We know the price of spending... The Ukrainian ensign is still standing at the gates of Donetsk and Lugansk. We are confident and confident that everything is possible, and the blue and yellow colors have turned to all Ukrainian places! Today, 23 September, Ukrposhta will introduce a postage stamp - Everything will be UA! - which will remind the Ukrainians, what we are obligated to see and try and double the size of the Ukrainian land! Holy shit, Ukraine! Eternal shana for the skin, who, having died, defending blue-yellow colors! Video is too big

Title: 🖼 Today, on the Day of the State Ensign of Ukraine, we are creat...
Description: Today, on the Day of the State Ensign of Ukraine, we are creating a symbol that unites Ukrainians around the world. The blue and yellow banner is a symbol of our national dignity, freedom and independence. With the onset of Russia’s full-scale war against Ukraine, the sovereign ensign acquired special significance for aviators. Having become a symbol of the struggle for freedom and sovereignty, it has increased the strength of the most important moments. The presence of round blue-yellow markings on the wings of Ukrainian flying aircraft is an important element of identification in the wind, which allows you to quickly identify Ukrainian flying aircraft from enemies. The ensign on board the aircraft is a sign that the pilot is ready to give all his strength for the protection of Ukraine, its independence and the future. The message of the Ukrainian aviators in the future is that we will be able to bring peace to the native land closer. of millions of Ukrainians. Vіn reminds us about the day, about those who at the same time we will overcome any difficulties and choose the right to a happy and happy future. HAPPY DAY OF THE AUTHORITY OF UKRAINE!🇺🇦📸✍🏻 114 Brigade technical aviation

Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mikola Oleshchuk⚡️ 14 STRIKE UAVs KILLED➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖On September 23, 2024, the enemy attacked the enemy with ballistic missiles -Iskander-M-/KN-2 3 from Voronezk region and 16th attack UAVs of the -Shahed- type (launch areas - Yeisk, Kursk - Russian Federation).💥 As a result of the anti-aircraft battle by aviation, radio electronic warfare units and the destruction of mobile fire groups of the Ukrainian Defense Forces, 14 were killed unit-. Two more - locationally spent, information was not found until the ruins. Anti-violent defense was carried out in the Cherkassy, ​​Kirovograd, Poltava and Sumy regions. For the combat work! HIGH PRIOR OF UKRAINE!➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🦅 Commander Military Forces Lieutenant General Mykola Oleshchuk
